Talent.Name: Accurate Shot
Talent.Description: Deal Accurate Shot level in extra damage with ranged weapons

Talent.Name: Acute Sense (Hearing)
Talent.Description: Take Perception Tests to detect otherwise imperceptible details associated with hearing

Talent.Name: Acute Sense (Smell)
Talent.Description: Take Perception Tests to detect otherwise imperceptible details associated with smell

Talent.Name: Acute Sense (Sight)
Talent.Description: Take Perception Tests to detect otherwise imperceptible details associated with sight

Talent.Name: Acute Sense (Taste)
Talent.Description: Take Perception Tests to detect otherwise imperceptible details associated with taste

Talent.Name: Acute Sense (Touch)
Talent.Description: Take Perception Tests to detect otherwise imperceptible details associated with touch

Talent.Name: Aethyric Attunement
Talent.Description: Don't suffer a Miscast when rolling doubles on successful Channel Tests

Talent.Name: Alley Cat
Talent.Description: When using Stealh(Urban), you may reverse the dice of failed Tests

Talent.Name: Ambidextrous
Talent.Description: Only suffer -10 to Tests relying solely on your secondary hand, instead of -20

Talent.Name: Animal Affinity
Talent.Description: Unless given a compelling reason, Bestial creatures will be calm around you

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Beasts)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Death)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Fire)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Heavens)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Metal)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Shadow)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Light)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Arcane Magic(Life)
Talent.Description: See page 133 in the core rulebook

Talent.Name: Argumentative
Talent.Description: On a successful Charm test in a debate, use units die value OR rolled SL for SL bonus

Talent.Name: Artistic
Talent.Description: You have a natural talent for art

Talent.Name: Attractive
Talent.Description: On a Successful Charm test towards someone attracted to you, use units die value OR rolled SL for SL bonus

Talent.Name: Battle Rage
Talent.Description: You can end your frenzy with a successful Cool Test at the end of the round

Talent.Name: Beat Blade
Talent.Description: Perform Melee Test, if successful your opponent gets -1 Advantage plus an additional -1 per SL

Talent.Name: Beneath Notice
Talent.Description: You are ignored by those of higher Status Tiers, unless acting incongruously

Talent.Name: Beserk Charge
Talent.Description: When Charging, gain +1 Damage per level in this talent

Talent.Name: Blather
Talent.Description: Attempt opposed Charm/Intelligence test. Success gives opponant Stunned condition

Talent.Name: Bless
Talent.Description: Able to perform Blessings
